name: Portal Gun
description: A handheld device that allows you to create interdimensional portals.

name: Meeseeks Box
description: Press the button, and a Mr. Meeseeks will appear to fulfill a single task.

name: Plumbus
description: A mysterious and versatile household item, every home should have one!

name: Morty's Spaceship
description: A miniature spaceship that Morty once used for intergalactic adventures.

name: Interdimensional Cable
description: Access bizarre television channels from different dimensions!

name: Rick's Flask
description: A flask containing Rick's favorite interdimensional alcohol.

name: Plasma Blaster
description: A futuristic weapon capable of shooting plasma bolts.

name: Mr. Poopybutthole Doll
description: A plush doll resembling Mr. Poopybutthole, the beloved character.

name: Szechuan Sauce
description: A limited edition dipping sauce with a hint of Szechuan flavor.

name: Rick's Lab Coat
description: A replica of Rick's iconic lab coat for all your mad scientist experiments.

name: Pickle Rick Diary
description: A journal styled with Pickle Rick

name: Jerry's Mug
description: A coffee mug with Jerry's face
